venue.name: Hopewell Geologic Feature

item.description:
Announcing a new meeting for *Healthy Attitudes* Walking and Eating for a Great Life! Forever Young and the Wethersfield Kayaking Group

What: AL-R's Walk by a Geological Feature

When: Sunday, May 18, 12:30 PM

Where: Click the link below to find out!

Meeting Description: Walk & Lunch by a Geological Feature


When
Sunday, May 18, 2008 at 12:30 PM 20080518T163000Z

Where
Hopewell Geologic Feature
500 Hopewell Road ~~Park at the Pool Parking Lot
South Glastonbury , CT 06073

Who should come
Those that need to reduce their ass size

Why
You will be as attractive as a 18 year old MOVIE STAR if you do go..
How to find the organizer(s)
"I will have my Blue Avalon and Orange Traffic cones in view"
--AL-r

Details

Hi Everyone,

Yes i wanted to do some kayaking this week, however its too windy and with the possibility of rain, it just isn't that nice to hit the water on this particular day based of Fridays weather prediction for sunday...besides its just the beginning of the season..

Ok this is AL's type of walk/hike, (its close, its not terribly long, its eat at the destination, and it has a worthwhile feature to see).

So i will bring my little grill, and something to cook..not sure what yet.. I do that based on who might go and what i see in the store right before the event or what i want...LOL

And i dont like to have a list of stuff for people to bring..
So bring what you like and a bit more, everyone likes surprizes.

I dont like to give the distance and time of the walk, even though i have been here before and when i was a kid many times.
We will take our time and waite for the slow pokes but also to explore other features along the way..so no one is really a slow poke.....thats what i think this kind of walk should be anyway, enjoyment and discovery, not just looking at your feet to avoid tripping..stop for a moment...then return..and snort like piggs while eating so fast in some kind of restaurant smelling sweaty people , burping and farting, and that are talking about stuff you dont want to hear yet cant change seats at kind of event...

At the destination, its lunch time and enjoy the surroundings, converse, and try some foods.
then take our time going back, maybe variying the return path.

How long ?...its over when its over...thats how long...LOL


Ok Getting there:

From Hartford:
take 91 south (if above Hartford) to 84 WEST, Cross the CT river bridge, get onto Rt 2 South, follow rt2 south till you see a sign for exit 7,
Ok i dont remember the exact exit sign number, but its the exit for rte 17 south,
take rt 17 south to its end where it meets Main Street..
follow Main Street for apx 1.25 miles untill it intersects with Hopewell Rd on the left,
Take a left onto Hopewell Rd for apx 1.2 miles and look for the intersection of Matson Hill Road, at this intersection is a swimming pool of to the right, pull into the pool parking lot, we will be there.


Rain cancels the event...but i will check in the morning and make a determination then..

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: Sorry I dont have a Kayak event for today, But how about a walk ???
